com.sanjay.common.dto

Class OutboundMail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sanjay.common.dto.OutboundMail

  • public class OutboundMail
extends java.lang.Object
    Required for Out bound service to send mail. Uses OutboundMailBuilder to build OutboundMail.
    Author:
    SANJAY
    See Also:
    OutboundMailUtil, MailTransferProperties, OutboundMail.OutboundMailBuilder
